channel.title: Battle-X Development Team
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://battle-x.net/public/style_images/infinite_dark/bx.png[/img] I'm looking for another Developer for a dedicated server we can run. Content Developer: - Must know Java/basic scripting. Javaguru(On R-S) The Djinn (Mopar) Open Open Website Developer: - Must know HTML, PHP, MYSQL. Javaguru The web guy Core Developer: - Must know Java. Javaguru Open Skills/Misc Developer: - Must know Java. Javaguru Open [code] 1. MSN: 2. Years of java experience: 3. Your previous projects: 4. How long will you be able to work on Battle-X each day: 5. What would you like to focus on (Skills, Quests, Core, Website, Content, etc): [/code] Why should you join? This server is destined to succeed. I have no problem with any expenses on Dedicated Server hosting as I have 4 dedicated servers for various things I do. (Can show, 3 Windows, 1 CentOS) The only reason I shut my RS2 Servers down in the past was because I was by myself and didn't have all the time to work on it, but they all hit high players. I'm good with various languages that would be needed, ie: Java, php, html, mysql, js, ect. You will also get a cookie.
Added Character/Forum registration accounts are linked to eachother, added a option to hide yourself on hiscores. Added a deletion pin which is required to change your ingame accounts password. It is also required to have if you want to delete your ingame account. Encrypts in MD5. Will be required to be registered on the website inorder to play/login. Everything will be saved to MySQL - banks,inventorys,stats,experience, ect. Each account is limited to 10 ingame accounts, if they want another they will need to delete an ingame account. It's going to be 1 starter set per forum account. 1 Forum account per IP. (Still need to implement this) -won't be hard to do though.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agDAfTUk1KY[/youtube] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/vsesnp.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/hs6i38.jpg[/img] The Website will be [url=Http://Battle-X.net]Http://Battle-X.net[/url] (IPB at the moment, will redo everything soon when I got some time, might make a home page.) I'll be using this base, it's Project Insanity. I hosted it about 5 months ago, I already worked on some of it as of today as well. [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/412213-battle-x-317-24-7-up-time-vote-webclient.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/412213-battle-x-317-24-7-up-time-vote-webclient.html[/url] Some of my past projects which I mainly discontinued/don't work on. [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-classic/projects/399776-google-v20-runescape-classic-good-rates.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-classic/projects/399776-google-v20-runescape-classic-good-rates.html[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/365999-neuro-x-640-a.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/365999-neuro-x-640-a.html[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/359653-project-neurox-640-a.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/359653-project-neurox-640-a.html[/url][/CENTER] Ready, go. PS. I won't accept immature people, nor people who know little to nothing. I'll be testing you on a few things as well to make sure you know what you're doing. I'm mainly looking for another developer because I have Work, College, and other things so I'm busy and can't and don't have all the time in the world to work on it 24-7 by myself. ----- I just had 2 other developers that I just kicked out due to the reason they weren't on and did no work what-so-ever and probably just wanted to get the source/updates I did on them. I want people who are dedicated and can work on it daily.

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

Hey, I am not really well known here, I joined a longgg time ago though, and I would like to get back into the rsps community, so why not apply for your project, so here is my application:
My name is Logan, and I am 18.
Msn: Logang2009@hotmail.com
2. I have been programming on and off for many years, maybe late 2008, early 2009 is when I started.
3. Many unreleased projects And when I say many I mean tons, proof can be shown on MSN via images.
4. Anytime after work, I work from 6am-3-4pm Pacific US standard time.
5. I would like to focus on more content development thats what I do best, but I can do others also. I’m not bad at web site dev either. :).

Of course, anything else don’t hesitate to contact me.
Thanks in advance, Logan G.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:11, topic:465980”]Dat Cookie

Djiin! I support this. Good luck.[/quote]

Thanks!

We’re still accepting more people, come join!

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:8, topic:465980”]1. MSN: I’ll have to check and see what it is again.
2. Years of experience: I’m going to alter this application as I’m applying for Web Developer, I’ve had six years with HTML, 5 1/2 years with CSS, 4 years with PHP and SQL, and 3 years with JavaScript/Ajax.
3. Your previous projects: Heh… Just look all over Moparscape, aside from Moparscape I do professional website development as a mostly full time job. I’ve also created a few text-based games, and my own social network. Currently working on creating my own open source forums, such as SMF, phpBB, ipB, etc.
4. How long will you be able to work on Battle-X each day: A couple hours at least outside of school, and sometimes I’ll have an hour or two to work in school.
5. What would you like to focus on (Skills, Quests, Core, Website, Content, etc): Website, as stated earlier.[/quote]

Accepted for that position - I can setup a Cpanel for you to manage the Website/MySQL, I’ll send you a PM once I’m off work or just PM me your MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

  1. MSN: kingcobra805@live.com
  2. Years of java experience: oh jesus…3 years?
  3. Your previous projects: Imperica-PvP, Xenium-X, NineDivine, was going to start a new project but didnt have a clue on what to do it on so i figured i’d look around to join a project.
  4. How long will you be able to work on Battle-X each day: 8-12 hrs daily.
  5. What would you like to focus on (Skills, Quests, Core, Website, Content, etc):
    i’m good with alot of things not just one specific thing but i’m good @ website’s/Content/Core/ Quests (anything to do with dialogues) not too great with skills but i could figure it out…

–Btw, i have not programmed in awhile so i’m a bit rusty atm, but i get the hang of things quick.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

Anyone else care to Apply, I’m at least looking for 1 developer who would be just as dedicated as me and work on it without me having do all of the work like my past ones who did absolutely nothing.

There is much more to do on this server, I’m in the process of redoing a lot of content.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Looks decent, good luck.

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:2, topic:465980”]How do you expect to gain developers if you don’t have any proof of your work. Sure you showed your past projects, but you haven’t told us anything about this one. How do we know what you’re looking for, server-wise? We don’t. As of now, I think you’re wanting a partner so they can do all the work. This goes back to what I said previously. We must have proof that this will actually go somewhere, and that it’s a serious project.[/quote]’

I’ve showed you past projects, and a project that has been running nearly 3 1/2 years now? I’ve showed your enough proof of my work, due to the past projects I’ve posted. If you would really like to see some more of my work feel free to add me on msn or skype. I’ll post some pictures of development. I had another project thread on here back from a few months ago, (6 months ago ) but I decided not to bump it and start from a scratch one. I’ll pull some things off that.

Also, you can go through my recent topics and see some of my past projects Involving Runescape Classic.

The Djinn.

Apply away people!

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

  1. MSN: harvi@live.co.uk
  2. Years of java experience: 1 1/2
  3. Your previous projects: I am fairly new at Java Programming but would like to learn, I learn fast. Here is my first project. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,572963.0.html
  4. How long will you be able to work on Battle-X each day: 2-4 hours
  5. What would you like to focus on (Skills, Quests, Core, Website, Content, etc): Core, Skills.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Development Team
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

How do you expect to gain developers if you don’t have any proof of your work. Sure you showed your past projects, but you haven’t told us anything about this one. How do we know what you’re looking for, server-wise? We don’t. As of now, I think you’re wanting a partner so they can do all the work. This goes back to what I said previously. We must have proof that this will actually go somewhere, and that it’s a serious project.

Read full topic

item.description:

[CENTER]

I’m looking for another Developer for a dedicated server we can run.

Content Developer: - Must know Java/basic scripting.
Javaguru(On R-S) The Djinn (Mopar)
Open

Website Developer: - Must know HTML, PHP, MYSQL.

Javaguru
Open

1. MSN:
2. Years of java experience:
3. Your previous projects:
4. How long will you be able to work on Battle-X each day:
5. What would you like to focus on (Skills, Quests, Core,  Website, Content, etc):

Why should you join?
This server is destined to succeed.
I have no problem with any expenses on Dedicated Server hosting as I have 4 dedicated servers for various things I do. (Can show, 3 Windows, 1 CentOS)
The only reason I shut my RS2 Servers down in the past was because I was by myself and didn’t have all the time to work on it, but they all hit high players.
I’m good with various languages that would be needed, ie: Java, php, html, mysql, js, ect.
You will also get a cookie.

Added Character/Forum registration accounts are linked to eachother, added a option to hide yourself on hiscores. Added a deletion pin which is required to change your ingame accounts password. It is also required to have if you want to delete your ingame account. Encrypts in MD5. Will be required to be registered on the website inorder to play/login. Everything will be saved to MySQL - banks,inventorys,stats,experience, ect. Each account is limited to 10 ingame accounts, if they want another they will need to delete an ingame account. It's going to be 1 starter set per forum account. 1 Forum account per IP. (Still need to implement this) -won't be hard to do though.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agDAfTUk1KY[/youtube]

vsesnp.png1311×534

hs6i38.jpg761×499

The Website will be Http://Battle-X.net (IPB at the moment, will redo everything soon when I got some time, might make a home page.)

I’ll be using this base, it’s Project Insanity. I hosted it about 5 months ago, I already worked on some of it as of today as well.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/412213-battle-x-317-24-7-up-time-vote-webclient.html

Some of my past projects which I mainly discontinued/don’t work on.

Ready, go.

PS. I won’t accept immature people, nor people who know little to nothing. I’ll be testing you on a few things as well to make sure you know what you’re doing. I’m mainly looking for another developer because I have Work, College, and other things so I’m busy and can’t and don’t have all the time in the world to work on it 24-7 by myself.

I just had 2 other developers that I just kicked out due to the reason they weren’t on and did no work what-so-ever and probably just wanted to get the source/updates I did on them. I want people who are dedicated and can work on it daily.
